ActCanada Agricultural Products Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Organic Products Regulations, 2009
PrecisRegulations Amending the ORGANIC PRODUCTS REGULATIONS, 2009 in order to keep the Regulations current by updating the reference of International Standard Organization (ISO) 65 to ISO/IEC 17065 thereby facilitating compatibility with international organic certification systems and enabling the Canadian Food Inspection Agency to continue to meet Canadaâ€™s international obligations required by existing equivalency arrangements.
